CustomField.description: Display an image for each Case Origin values
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Email'), IMAGE('/resource/1692888696000/Origin_Email','Email error', -1, -1) , IF( ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Phone'), IMAGE('/resource/1692888713000/Origin_Call?','Phone error', -1, -1) , IF( ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Web'), IMAGE('/resource/1692888781000/Origin_Web?','Web error', -1, -1) , IF( ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Chat'), IMAGE('/resource/1692888735000/Origin_Chat?','Chat error', -1, -1) , IF( ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Voicemail'), IMAGE('/resource/1692888791000/Origin_Voicemail?','Voicemail error', -1, -1) , IF( ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Chat-to-case'), IMAGE('/resource/1692888809000/Origin_ChatToCase?','Chat to case error', -1, -1) , IF( ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Twitter'), IMAGE('/resource/1692888801000/Origin_Twitter?','Twitter error', 30, 40) , IMAGE('/resource/1692888817000/Origin_Case?', 'Image error', -1, -1) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Channel
